briefTitle: TARGeted Intraoperative radioTherapy With INTRABEAM as a Boost for Breast Cancer - A Quality Control Registry
officialTitle: TARGeted Intraoperative radioTherapy With the INTRABEAM-System as an Advanced Boost in Patients With Breast Cancer - A Quality Control Registry in Germany (TARGIT BQR)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Tumor diameter \< 3,5 cm
* Informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* No informed consent
* Tumor size \> 3,5 cm
* No indication for a boost
